physical_appearance:This is a silver cross. It has a small looped segment attached at the top. Its surface is engraved with repeated floral motifs on all sides. There are no rust seen.

sgcool_label_text:This is a rare example of a nineteenth century silver crucifix typical of the Kandyan region in Sri Lanka. The surface is embellished with decorative floral motifs accompanied by foliage
 front and back. A moveable silver loop is attached to the top
 to allow for suspension by a chain.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a silver cross. It has a small looped segment attached at the top. Its surface is engraved with repeated floral motifs on all sides. There are no rust seen.
metadata.sgcool_label_text: This is a rare example of a nineteenth century silver crucifix typical of the Kandyan region in Sri Lanka. The surface is embellished with decorative floral motifs accompanied by foliage, front and back. A moveable silver loop is attached to the top, to allow for suspension by a chain.
